title: ‘It Was Meant to Be’: Humbled Wout van Aert in Awe of Van der Poel
content:
Silver medalist Van Aert details complications in his bid to take on Mathieu van der Poel: ‘It was a typical world championship. Insane’.

Read the full article at ‘It Was Meant to Be’: Humbled Wout van Aert in Awe of Van der Poel on Velo.
author: sstokes
